content.title: Loan Based Schemes For Safai Karamchari - Education Loan Scheme (ELS)
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.beneficiary: Safai Karamcharis, Manual Scavengers, and their dependents aged 18 years and above
content.details: An Education Loan scheme by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment for Safai Karamchari, Manual Scavengers, and their dependents aged 18 years and above. Under this scheme, term loans are extended through State Channelising Agencies (SCA), Regional Rural Banks (RRBs) and Nationalised Banks to the target group.
benefits: Upto 90% of the unit cost with a maximum unit cost of Rs.10.00 lacs for study in India and Rs.20.00 lacs to study abroad at interest rate of 4%
0.5% per annum rebate for women in case of study in India
Coverage for Admission Fees & Tuition Fee, Books, Stationery, Examination Fee, Boarding and lodging expenses, Insurance premium for policy
eligibility: Safai Karamcharis (including Wastepickers), identified Manual Scavengers and their dependents.
Registered co-operative societies of the target group.
Legally constituted association/firm promoted by the target group.
Persons with a certificate from local authorities as specified.
Mukhia/ Sarpanch/ President or equivalent authority for the issue of Occupation Certificate.
content.application_process: Online application process through district offices of SCAs of NSKFDC of RRBs and Nationalised Banks.
